profile.title: Profile
profile.message: This information will be displayed publicly, so be careful what you share.
profile.aboutMessage: Write a few sentences about your organization. This will be displayed on your profile page.

private.title: Private Organization Information
private.message: This information will be kept private and will not be shared with other users. Its purpose is to contact you in case of any issues.

confirmModal.title: Confirm your application
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to submit your application? You will not be able to edit it after submission. You will be able to change your organization's data after your request has been approved.

other.logOutTitle: Are you sure you want to log out?
other.logOutMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?
